name: Hail
flavorText: Summons a hailstorm that strikes every turn.

name: Endeavor
flavorText: Gains power if the user’s HP is lower than the foe’s HP.

name: Steel Wing
flavorText: Stiff wings strike the foe.

name: Outrage
flavorText: Works 2-3 turns and confuses user.

name: Scary Face
flavorText: Sharply reduces the foe's SPEED.

name: Spite
flavorText: Cuts the PP of the foe's last move.

name: Reversal
flavorText: Stronger if the user's HP is low.

name: Crush Claw
flavorText: Tears at the foe with sharp claws. May lower DEFENSE.

name: Shell Trap
flavorText: The user sets a shell trap. If the user is hit by a physical move, the trap will explode and inflict damage on the opposing Pokémon.

name: Light Screen
flavorText: Ups SPCL.DEF with a wall of light.

name: Icy Wind
flavorText: An icy attack that lowers SPEED.

name: Curse
flavorText: Works differently for ghost-types.

name: Reflect
flavorText: Raises DEFENSE with a barrier.

name: Giga Drain
flavorText: Steals 1/2 of the damage inflicted.

name: Block
flavorText: Blocks the foe’s way to prevent escape.

name: Dazzling Gleam
flavorText: The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a powerful flash.

name: Precipice Blades
flavorText: The user attacks opposing Pokémon by manifesting the power of the land in fearsome blades of stone.

name: Rain Dance
flavorText: Boosts water-type moves for 5 turns.

name: Rock Slide
flavorText: An attack that may cause flinching.

name: Knock Off
flavorText: Knocks down the foe’s held item to prevent its use.

name: Happy Hour
flavorText: Using Happy Hour doubles the amount of prize money received after battle.

name: Force Palm
flavorText: The foe is attacked with a shock wave. It may also leave the target paralyzed.

name: Blaze Kick
flavorText: A kick with a high critical- hit ratio. May cause a burn.

name: Quiver Dance
flavorText: The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance. It boosts the user’s Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

name: Teatime
flavorText: The user has teatime with all the Pokémon in the battle. Each Pokémon eats its held Berry.

name: Court Change
flavorText: With its mysterious power, the user swaps the effects on either side of the field.

name: Fiery Wrath
flavorText: The user transforms its wrath into a fire-like aura to attack. This may also make opposing Pokémon flinch.

name: Body Press
flavorText: The user attacks by slamming its body into the target. The higher the user's Defense, the more damage it can inflict on the target.

name: Hyper Beam
flavorText: 1st turn: Attack 2nd turn: Rest

name: Ingrain
flavorText: Lays roots that restore HP. The user can’t switch out.

name: Power Gem
flavorText: The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as if it were made of gemstones.

name: Wake-Up Slap
flavorText: This attack inflicts high damage on a sleeping foe. It also wakes the foe up, however.

name: Fire Pledge
flavorText: A column of fire hits opposing Pokémon. When used with its Grass equivalent, its damage increases into a vast sea of fire.

name: Tickle
flavorText: The user tickles the target into laughing, reducing its Attack and Defense stats.

name: Trump Card
flavorText: The fewer PP this move has, the more power it has for attack.

name: Judgment
flavorText: The user releases countless shots of light. Its type varies with the kind of Plate the user is holding.

name: Wood Hammer
flavorText: The user slams its rugged body into the foe to attack. The user also sustains serious damage.

name: Wide Guard
flavorText: The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging attacks for one turn. If used in succession, its chance of failing rises.

name: Double Hit
flavorText: The user slams the foe with a tail, etc. The target is hit twice in a row.

name: Solar Blade
flavorText: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light and fills a blade with the light’s energy, attacking the target on the next turn.

name: Fusion Flare
flavorText: The user brings down a giant flame. This attack does greater damage when influenced by an enormous thunderbolt.

name: Heat Crash
flavorText: The user slams its target with its flame- covered body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater the damage.

name: Spotlight
flavorText: The user shines a spotlight on the target so that only the target will be attacked during the turn.

name: Flame Burst
flavorText: The user attacks the target with a bursting flame. The bursting flame damages Pokémon next to the target as well.

name: Moonblast
flavorText: Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks the target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Icicle Crash
flavorText: The user attacks by harshly dropping an icicle onto the target. It may also make the target flinch.

name: Toxic Thread
flavorText: The user shoots poisonous threads to poison the target and lower the target’s Speed stat.

name: Psycho Boost
flavorText: Allows a full-power attack, but sharply lowers SP. ATK.

name: Guard Split
flavorText: The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of its target’s.

name: Guard Swap
flavorText: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Defense and Sp. Def with the foe.

name: Rock Wrecker
flavorText: The user launches a huge boulder at the foe to attack. It must rest on the next turn, however.

name: Powder
flavorText: The user covers the target in a powder that explodes and damages the target if it uses a Fire-type move.

name: Clangorous Soul
flavorText: The user raises all its stats by using some of its HP.

name: Obstruct
flavorText: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession. Direct contact harshly lowers the attacker's Defense stat.

name: Tar Shot
flavorText: The user pours sticky tar over the target, lowering the target's Speed stat. The target becomes weaker to Fire-type moves.

name: Dragon Darts
flavorText: The user attacks twice using Dreepy. If there are two targets, this move hits each target once.

name: Leafage
flavorText: The user attacks by pelting the target with leaves.

name: Jungle Healing
flavorText: The user becomes one with the jungle, restoring HP and healing any status conditions of itself and its ally Pokémon in battle.

name: Magic Powder
flavorText: The user scatters a cloud of magic powder that changes the target to Psychic type.

name: Double Iron Bash
flavorText: The user rotates, centering the hex nut in its chest, and then strikes with its arms twice in a row. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Frustration
flavorText: An attack that is stronger if the TRAINER is disliked.

name: Confide
flavorText: The user tells the target a secret, and the target loses its ability to concentrate. This lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Thief
flavorText: An attack that may steal a held item.

name: Dragon Pulse
flavorText: The foe is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user’s gaping mouth.

name: Sheer Cold
flavorText: A chilling attack that causes fainting if it hits.

name: Skill Swap
flavorText: The user swaps special abilities with the target.

name: Embargo
flavorText: It prevents the foe from using its held item. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.

name: Worry Seed
flavorText: A seed that causes worry is planted on the foe. It prevents sleep by making its ability Insomnia.

name: Dragon Claw
flavorText: Slashes the foe with sharp claws.

name: Flame Charge
flavorText: The user cloaks itself with flame and attacks. Building up more power, it raises the user’s Speed stat.

name: Rock Polish
flavorText: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. It can sharply raise the Speed stat.

name: X-Scissor
flavorText: The user slashes at the foe by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.

name: Camouflage
flavorText: Alters the POKéMON’s type depending on the location.

name: Bug Buzz
flavorText: The user vibrates its wings to generate a damaging sound wave. It may also lower the foe’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Rock Blast
flavorText: Hurls boulders at the foe 2 to 5 times in a row.

name: Cosmic Power
flavorText: Raises DEFENSE and SP. DEF with a mystic power.

name: Muddy Water
flavorText: Attacks with muddy water. May lower accuracy.

name: Refresh
flavorText: The user rests to cure itself of a poisoning, burn, or paralysis.

name: Beat Up
flavorText: Party POKéMON join in the attack.

name: Revenge
flavorText: An attack that gains power if injured by the foe.

name: Water Shuriken
flavorText: The user hits the target with throwing stars two to five times in a row. This move always goes first.

name: Tail Slap
flavorText: The user attacks by striking the target with its hard tail. It hits the target two to five times in a row.

name: Plasma Fists
flavorText: The user attacks with electrically charged fists. This move changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type moves.

name: Oblivion Wing
flavorText: The user absorbs its target’s HP. The user’s HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.

name: Chatter
flavorText: The user attacks using a sound wave based on words it has learned. It may also confuse the foe.

name: Lunar Dance
flavorText: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its status and HP fully restored.

name: Belch
flavorText: The user lets out a damaging belch at the target. The user must eat a held Berry to use this move.

name: Menacing Moonraze Maelstrom
flavorText: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Lunala, attacks the target with full force. This move can ignore the effect of the target’s Ability.

name: Gear Up
flavorText: The user engages its gears to raise the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.

name: Light That Burns the Sky
flavorText: This attack inflicts Attack or Sp. Atk damage— whichever stat is higher for the user, Necrozma.  This move ignores the target’s Ability.

name: Ice Hammer
flavorText: The user swings and hits with its strong, heavy fist. It lowers the user’s Speed, however.

name: Spacial Rend
flavorText: The user tears the foe along with the space around it. This move has a high critical-hit ratio.

name: 10,000,000 Volt Thunderbolt
flavorText: The user, Pikachu wearing a cap, powers up a jolt of electricity using its Z-Power and unleashes it. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Defend Order
flavorText: The user calls out its underlings to make a living shield, raising its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

name: Black Hole Eclipse
flavorText: The user gathers dark energy using its Z-Power and sucks the target into it. The power varies, depending on the original move.

name: Heal Pulse
flavorText: The user emits a healing pulse which restores the target’s HP by up to half of its max HP.

name: Misty Terrain
flavorText: The user covers the ground under everyone’s feet with mist for five turns. This protects Pokémon on the ground from status conditions.

name: Play Rough
flavorText: The user plays rough with the target and attacks it. This may also lower the target’s Attack stat.

name: Soak
flavorText: The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and changes the target’s type to Water.

name: Ice Burn
flavorText: On the second turn, an ultracold, freezing wind surrounds the target. This may leave the target with a burn.

name: Freeze Shock
flavorText: On the second turn, the user hits the target with electrically charged ice. It may leave the target with paralysis.

name: Dragon Ascent
flavorText: After soaring upward, the user attacks its target by dropping out of the sky at high speeds, although it lowers its own Defense and Sp. Def in the process.

name: Magma Storm
flavorText: The foe becomes trapped within a maelstrom of fire that rages for two to five turns.

name: Let’s Snuggle Forever
flavorText: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Mimikyu, punches the target with full force.

name: Spiky Shield
flavorText: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also damages any attacker who makes direct contact.

name: Circle Throw
flavorText: The user throws the target and drags out another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

name: Fiery Dance
flavorText: Cloaked in flames, the user dances and flaps its wings. It may also raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Draining Kiss
flavorText: The user steals the target’s energy with a kiss. The user’s HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.

name: Power Trip
flavorText: The user boasts its strength and attacks the target. The more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the move’s power.

name: Ally Switch
flavorText: The user teleports using a strange power and switches its place with one of its allies.

name: All-Out Pummeling
flavorText: The user rams an energy orb created by its Z-Power into the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

name: Flying Press
flavorText: The user dives down onto the target from the sky. This move is Fighting and Flying type simultaneously.

name: Nature’s Madness
flavorText: The user hits the target with the force of nature. It halves the target’s HP.

name: Head Smash
flavorText: The user delivers a life-endangering head butt at full power. The user also takes terrible damage.

name: Aurora Veil
flavorText: This move reduces damage from physical and special moves for five turns. This can be used only in a hailstorm.

name: Origin Pulse
flavorText: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with countless beams of light that glow adeep and brilliant blue.

name: Laser Focus
flavorText: The user concentrates intensely. The attack on the next turn always results in a critical hit.

name: Flatter
flavorText: Confuses the foe, but raises its SP. ATK.

name: Protect
flavorText: Foils attack that turn. It may fail.

name: Double Team
flavorText: Heightens evasiveness.

name: Thunder
flavorText: An attack that may cause paralysis.

name: Uproar
flavorText: Causes an uproar for 2 to 5 turns and prevents sleep.

name: Focus Punch
flavorText: A powerful loyalty attack. The user flinches if hit.

name: Helping Hand
flavorText: Boosts the power of the recipient’s moves.

name: Volt Switch
flavorText: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

name: Trick
flavorText: Tricks the foe into trading held items.

name: Scald
flavorText: The user shoots boiling hot water at its target. It may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Power-Up Punch
flavorText: Striking opponents over and over makes the user’s fists harder. Hitting atarget raises the Attack stat.

name: Gyro Ball
flavorText: The user tackles the foe with a high-speed spin. The slower the user, the greater the damage.

name: Flash Cannon
flavorText: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. It may also lower the foe’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Psyshock
flavorText: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.

name: Chip Away
flavorText: Looking for an opening, the user strikes continually. The target’s stat changes don’t affect this attack’s damage.

name: Snarl
flavorText: The user yells as if it is ranting about something, making the target’s Sp. Atk stat decrease.

name: Electro Ball
flavorText: The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The faster the user is than the target, the greater the damage.

name: Rapid Spin
flavorText: A high-speed spinning attack.

name: Wonder Room
flavorText: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns.

name: Gunk Shot
flavorText: The user shoots filthy garbage at the foe to attack. It may also poison the target.

name: Frost Breath
flavorText: The user blows a cold breath on the target. This attack always results in a critical hit.

name: Attract
flavorText: Makes the opposite gender infatuated.

name: Facade
flavorText: Boosts ATTACK when burned, paralyzed, or poisoned.

name: Snore
flavorText: A loud attack that can be used only while asleep.

name: Drain Punch
flavorText: An energy-draining punch. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

name: Sky Drop
flavorText: The user takes the target into the sky, then drops it during the next turn. The target cannot attack while in the sky.

name: Dragon Tail
flavorText: The user knocks away the target and drags out another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

name: Mirror Coat
flavorText: Counters a SPCL. ATK. move double.

name: Psycho Shift
flavorText: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status problems to the target.

name: Snap Trap
flavorText: The user snares the target in a snap trap for four to five turns.

name: Stuff Cheeks
flavorText: The user eats its held Berry, then sharply raises its Defense stat.

name: Coaching
flavorText: The user properly coaches its ally Pokémon, boosting their Attack and Defense stats.

name: Scale Shot
flavorText: The user attacks by shooting scales two to five times in a row. This move boosts the user's Speed stat but lowers its Defense stat.

name: Meteor Beam
flavorText: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers space power and boosts its Sp. Atk stat, then attacks the target on the next turn.

name: Steel Beam
flavorText: The user fires a beam of steel that it collected from its entire body. This also damages the user.

name: Triple Axel
flavorText: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successful hit.

name: Corrosive Gas
flavorText: The user surrounds everything around it with highly acidic gas and melts away items they hold.

name: Pyro Ball
flavorText: The user attacks by igniting a small stone and launching it as a fiery ball at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Swagger
flavorText: Causes confusion and raises ATTACK.

name: Return
flavorText: An attack that is based on loyalty.

name: Natural Gift
flavorText: The user draws power to attack by using its held Berry. The Berry determines its type and power.

name: Taunt
flavorText: Taunts the foe into only using attack moves.

name: Charge Beam
flavorText: The user fires a concentrated bundle of electricity. It may also raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Work Up
flavorText: The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk stats increase.

name: Floral Healing
flavorText: The user restores the target’s HP by up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP when the terrain is grass.

name: Accelerock
flavorText: The user smashes into the target at high speed. This move always goes first.

name: Instruct
flavorText: The user instructs the target to use the target’s last move again.

name: Gigavolt Havoc
flavorText: The user hits the target with a powerful electric current collected by its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.

name: Slack Off
flavorText: Slacks off and restores half the maximum HP.

name: Burn Up
flavorText: To inflict massive damage, the user burns itself out. After using this move, the user will no longer be Fire type.

name: Smart Strike
flavorText: The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. This attack never misses.

name: Darkest Lariat
flavorText: The user swings both arms and hits the target. The target’s stat changes don’t affect this attack’s damage.

name: Rolling Kick
flavorText: A fast, spinning kick.

name: Sparkling Aria
flavorText: The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles. Any Pokémon suffering from a burn will be healed by the touch of these bubbles.

name: Comet Punch
flavorText: Repeatedly punches 2-5 times.

name: Dragon Rush
flavorText: The user tackles the foe while exhibiting overwhelming menace. It may also make the target flinch.

name: Tearful Look
flavorText: The user gets teary eyed to make the target lose its combative spirit. This lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

name: Steel Roller
flavorText: The user attacks while destroying the terrain. This move fails when the ground hasn't turned into a terrain.

name: Expanding Force
flavorText: The user attacks the target with its psychic power. This move's power goes up and damages all opposing Pokémon on Psychic Terrain.

name: Drum Beating
flavorText: The user plays its drum, controlling the drum's roots to attack the target. This also lowers the target's Speed stat.

name: Meteor Assault
flavorText: The user attacks wildly with its thick leek. The user can't move on the next turn, because the force of this move makes it stagger.

name: Aura Wheel
flavorText: Morpeko attacks and raises its Speed with the energy stored in its cheeks. This move's type changes depending on the user's form.

name: Lash Out
flavorText: The user lashes out to vent its frustration toward the target. If its stats were lowered during the turn, the power of this move is doubled.

name: Hidden Power
flavorText: The power varies with the POKéMON.

name: Substitute
flavorText: Makes a decoy with 1/4 user's max HP.

name: Echoed Voice
flavorText: The user attacks the target with an echoing voice. If this move is used every turn, it does greater damage.

name: Hammer Arm
flavorText: The user swings and hits with its strong and heavy fist. It lowers the user’s Speed, however.

name: Gust
flavorText: Whips up a strong gust of wind.

name: Recover
flavorText: Restores HP by 1/2 the max HP.

name: Poison Sting
flavorText: An attack that may poison the target.

name: Dragon Dance
flavorText: A mystical dance that ups ATTACK and SPEED.

name: Smokescreen
flavorText: Lowers the foe's accuracy.

name: Follow Me
flavorText: Draws attention to make foes attack only the user.

name: Strength Sap
flavorText: The user restores its HP by the same amount as the target’s Attack stat. It also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

name: Stomping Tantrum
flavorText: Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. If the user’s previous move has failed, the power of this move doubles.

name: Grass Whistle
flavorText: Lulls the foe into sleep with a pleasant melody.

name: Fire Lash
flavorText: The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This also lowers the target’s Defense stat.

name: Beak Blast
flavorText: The user first heats up its beak, and then it attacks the target. Making direct contact with the Pokémon while it’s heating up its beak results in a burn.

name: Prismatic Laser
flavorText: The user shoots powerful lasers using the power of a prism. The user can’t move on the next turn.

name: Water Spout
flavorText: Inflicts more damage if the user’s HP is high.

name: Shadow Bone
flavorText: The user attacks by beating the target with a bone that contains a spirit. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

name: Psychic Terrain
flavorText: This protects Pokémon on the ground from priority moves and powers up Psychic-type moves for five turns.

name: Sunsteel Strike
flavorText: The user slams into the target with the force of a meteor. This move can be used on the target  regardless of its Abilities.

name: Horn Attack
flavorText: An attack using a horn to jab.

name: Sky Uppercut
flavorText: An uppercut thrown as if leaping into the sky.

name: Vine Whip
flavorText: Whips the foe with slender vines.

name: First Impression
flavorText: Although this move has great power, it only works the first turn the user is in battle.

name: Weather Ball
flavorText: The move’s type and power change with the weather.

name: Psychic Fangs
flavorText: The user bites the target with its psychic capabilities. This can also destroy Light Screen and Reflect.

name: Genesis Supernova
flavorText: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Mew, attacks the target with full force. The terrain will be charged with psychic energy.

name: Fleur Cannon
flavorText: The user unleashes a strong beam. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Corkscrew Crash
flavorText: The user spins very fast and rams into the target with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.

name: Clangorous Soulblaze
flavorText: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Kommo-o, attacks the opposing Pokémon with full force. This move boosts the user’s stats.

name: Vacuum Wave
flavorText: The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure vacuum at the foe. This move always goes first.

name: Heart Swap
flavorText: The user employs its psychic power to switch stat changes with the foe.

name: Baneful Bunker
flavorText: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also poisons any attacker that makes direct contact.

name: Acupressure
flavorText: The user applies pressure to stress points, sharply boosting one of its stats.

name: Power Trick
flavorText: The user employs its psychic power to switch its Attack with its Defense stat.

name: Doom Desire
flavorText: Summons strong sunlight to attack 2 turns later.

name: Magnet Bomb
flavorText: The user launches a steel bomb that sticks to the target. This attack will not miss.

name: Bonemerang
flavorText: An attack that strikes twice.

name: Acid Spray
flavorText: The user spits fluid that works to melt the target. This harshly reduces the target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Rest
flavorText: Sleep for 2 turns to fully recover.

name: Rock Smash
flavorText: An attack that may lower DEFENSE.

name: Mega Punch
flavorText: A powerful punch thrown very hard.

name: Role Play
flavorText: Mimics the target and copies its special ability.

name: Screech
flavorText: Sharply reduces the foe's DEFENSE.

name: Air Cutter
flavorText: Hacks with razorlike wind. High critical-hit ratio.

name: Superpower
flavorText: Boosts strength sharply, but lowers abilities.

name: Odor Sleuth
flavorText: Negates the foe’s efforts to heighten evasiveness.

name: Brutal Swing
flavorText: The user swings its body around violently to inflict damage on everything in its vicinity.

name: Guillotine
flavorText: A one-hit KO, pincer attack.

name: Poison Fang
flavorText: A sharp-fanged attack. May badly poison the foe.

name: Acid
flavorText: An attack that may lower DEFENSE.

name: Wing Attack
flavorText: Strikes the target with wings.

name: Aurora Beam
flavorText: An attack that may lower ATTACK.

name: Pound
flavorText: Pounds with forelegs or tail.

name: Lucky Chant
flavorText: The user chants an incantation toward the sky, preventing the foe from landing critical hits.

name: Leaf Blade
flavorText: Slashes with a sharp leaf. High critical-hit ratio.

name: Thunder Shock
flavorText: An attack that may cause paralysis.

name: Pluck
flavorText: The user pecks the foe. If the foe is holding a Berry, the user plucks it and gains its effect.

name: Cotton Guard
flavorText: The user protects itself by wrapping its body in soft cotton, drastically raising the user’s Defense stat.

name: Horn Leech
flavorText: The user drains the target’s energy with its horns. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

name: Cross Poison
flavorText: A slashing attack that may also leave the target poisoned. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

name: Lava Plume
flavorText: An inferno of scarlet flames washes over all Pokémon in battle. It may also inflict burns.

name: Crafty Shield
flavorText: The user protects itself and its allies from status moves with a mysterious power. This does not stop moves that do damage.

name: Poison Gas
flavorText: A move that may poison the foe.

name: Roar of Time
flavorText: The user blasts the foe with power that distorts even time. The user must rest on the next turn.

name: Heal Order
flavorText: The user calls out its underlings to heal it. The user regains up to half of its max HP.

name: Inferno
flavorText: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. It leaves the target with a burn.

name: Crabhammer
flavorText: Has a high critical hit ratio.

name: Electric Terrain
flavorText: The user electrifies the ground under everyone’s feet for five turns. Pokémon on the ground no longer fall asleep.

name: Mirror Shot
flavorText: The user looses a flash of energy from its polished body. It may also lower the target’s accuracy.

name: Storm Throw
flavorText: The user strikes the target with a fierce blow. This attack always results in a critical hit.

name: Synchronoise
flavorText: Using an odd shock wave, the user inflicts damage on any Pokémon of the same type in the area around it.

name: Sunny Day
flavorText: Boosts fire-type moves for 5 turns.

name: Sleep Talk
flavorText: Randomly attacks while asleep.

name: Giga Impact
flavorText: The user charges at the foe using every bit of its power. The user must rest on the next turn.

name: Bite
flavorText: An attack that may cause flinching.

name: Sucker Punch
flavorText: This move enables the user to attack first. It fails if the foe is not readying an attack, however.

name: Crunch
flavorText: An attack that may lower SPCL.DEF.

name: Magnet Rise
flavorText: The user levitates using electrically generated magnetism for five turns.

name: Sand Attack
flavorText: Reduces accuracy by throwing sand.

name: Ice Punch
flavorText: An icy punch. May cause freezing.

name: Foresight
flavorText: Negates accuracy reduction moves.

name: Fissure
flavorText: A ground-type, one-hit KO attack.

name: Skull Bash
flavorText: 1st turn: Prepare 2nd turn: Attack

name: Tri Attack
flavorText: Fires three kinds of beams at once.

name: Sand Tomb
flavorText: Traps and hurts the foe in quicksand for 2 to 5 turns.

name: Extrasensory
flavorText: Attacks with a peculiar power. May cause flinching.

name: Air Slash
flavorText: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. It may also make the target flinch.

name: Bubble
flavorText: An attack that may reduce SPEED.

name: Aqua Jet
flavorText: The user lunges at the foe at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

name: Sludge Wave
flavorText: It swamps the area around the user with a giant sludge wave. It may also poison those hit.

name: Haze
flavorText: Eliminates all stat changes.

name: Close Combat
flavorText: The user fights the foe in close without guarding itself. It also cuts the user’s Defense and Sp. Def.

name: Electroweb
flavorText: The user captures and attacks opposing Pokémon by using an electric net. It reduces the targets’ Speed stat.

name: Shell Smash
flavorText: The user breaks its shell, lowering its Defense and Sp. Def stats but sharply raising Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

name: String Shot
flavorText: A move that lowers the foe's SPEED.

name: Fake Out
flavorText: A 1st-turn, 1st-strike move that causes flinching.

name: Spit Up
flavorText: Releases stockpiled power (the more the better).

name: Electrify
flavorText: If the target is electrified before it uses a move during that turn, the target’s move becomes Electric type.

name: Bolt Strike
flavorText: The user charges its target, surrounding itself with a great amount of electricity. It may leave the target with paralysis.

name: Razor Shell
flavorText: The user cuts its target with sharp shells. This attack may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

name: Simple Beam
flavorText: The user’s mysterious psychic wave changes the target’s Ability to Simple.

name: Mat Block
flavorText: Using a pulled-up mat as a shield, the user protects itself and its allies from damaging moves. This does not stop status moves.

name: Aromatic Mist
flavorText: The user raises the Sp. Def stat of an ally Pokémon by using a mysterious aroma.

name: Dark Void
flavorText: The foe is dragged into a world of total darkness that puts it to sleep.

name: Arm Thrust
flavorText: Straight-arm punches that strike the foe 2 to 5 times.

name: Drill Run
flavorText: The user crashes into its target while rotating its body like a drill. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Nuzzle
flavorText: The user attacks by nuzzling its electrified cheeks against the target. This also leaves the target with paralysis.

name: Shift Gear
flavorText: The user rotates its gears, raising its Attack and sharply raising its Speed.

name: Entrainment
flavorText: The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels the target to mimic it, making the target’s Ability the same as the user’s.

name: Sinister Arrow Raid
flavorText: The user, Decidueye, creates countless arrows using its Z-Power and shoots the target with full force.

name: Meteor Mash
flavorText: Fires a meteor-like punch. May raise ATTACK.

name: Magnetic Flux
flavorText: The user manipulates magnetic fields, which raises the Defense and Sp. Def stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.

name: Venom Drench
flavorText: Opposing Pokémon are drenched in an odd poisonous liquid. This lowers the Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats of a poisoned target.

name: Leaf Tornado
flavorText: The user attacks its target by encircling it in sharp leaves. This attack may also lower the target’s accuracy.

name: Steamroller
flavorText: The user crushes its targets by rolling over them with its rolled-up body. This attack may make the target flinch.

name: Stored Power
flavorText: The user attacks the target with stored power. The more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the damage.

name: Hold Back
flavorText: The user holds back when it attacks and the target is left with at least 1 HP.

name: Sacred Sword
flavorText: The user attacks by slicing with its long horns. The target’s stat changes don’t affect this attack’s damage.

name: Fusion Bolt
flavorText: The user throws down a giant thunderbolt. This attack does greater damage when influenced by an enormous flame.

name: Rototiller
flavorText: Tilling the soil, the user makes it easier for plants to grow. This raises the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of Grass-type Pokémon.

name: Fell Stinger
flavorText: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user’s Attack stat rises sharply.

name: Skitter Smack
flavorText: The user skitters behind the target to attack. This also lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Astral Barrage
flavorText: The user attacks by sending a frightful amount of small ghosts at opposing Pokémon.

name: Psychic
flavorText: An attack that may lower SPCL.DEF.

name: Body Slam
flavorText: An attack that may cause paralysis.

name: Seismic Toss
flavorText: The user's level equals damage HP.

name: Aqua Tail
flavorText: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

name: Charm
flavorText: Sharply lowers the foe's ATTACK.

name: Infestation
flavorText: The target is infested and attacked for four to five turns. The target can’t flee during this time.

name: Earth Power
flavorText: The user makes the ground under the foe erupt with power. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.

name: Last Resort
flavorText: This move can be used only after the user has used all the other moves it knows in the battle.

name: Dark Pulse
flavorText: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. It may also make the target flinch.

name: Brine
flavorText: If the foe’s HP is down to about half, this attack will hit with double the power.

name: Bulk Up
flavorText: Bulks up the body to boost both ATTACK and DEFENSE.

name: Wild Charge
flavorText: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into its target. It also damages the user a little.

name: Silver Wind
flavorText: A powdery attack that may raise abilities.

name: Heavy Slam
flavorText: The user slams into the target with its heavy body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater its damage.

name: Dual Chop
flavorText: The user attacks its target by hitting it with brutal strikes. The target is hit twice in a row.

name: Charge
flavorText: Charges power to boost the electric move used next.

name: Nasty Plot
flavorText: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. It sharply raises the user’s Sp. Atk.

name: Toxic Spikes
flavorText: The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the foe’s feet. They poison foes that switch into battle.

name: Aromatherapy
flavorText: Heals all status problems with a soothing scent.

name: Metal Sound
flavorText: Emits a horrible screech that sharply lowers SP. DEF.

name: Punishment
flavorText: This attack’s power increases the more the foe has powered up with stat changes.

name: Night Daze
flavorText: The user lets loose a pitch-black shock wave at its target. It may also lower the target’s accuracy.

name: Geomancy
flavorText: The user absorbs energy and sharply raises its Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats on the next turn.

name: Flower Shield
flavorText: The user raises the Defense stat of all Grass-type Pokémon in battle with a mysterious power.

name: Land’s Wrath
flavorText: The user gathers the energy of the land and focuses that power on opposing Pokémon to damage them.

name: Needle Arm
flavorText: Attacks with thorny arms. May cause flinching.

name: Psystrike
flavorText: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.

name: V-create
flavorText: With a hot flame on its forehead, the user hurls itself at its target. It lowers the user’s Defense, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

name: Power Split
flavorText: The user employs its psychic power to average its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with those of the target’s.

name: Frenzy Plant
flavorText: Powerful, but leaves the user immobile the next turn.

name: Photon Geyser
flavorText: The user attacks a target with a pillar of light. This move inflicts Attack or Sp. Atk damage—whichever stat is higher for the user.

name: Grass Pledge
flavorText: A column of grass hits opposing Pokémon. When used with its water equivalent, its damage increases into a vast swamp.

name: Aerial Ace
flavorText: An extremely speedy and unavoidable attack.

name: Swords Dance
flavorText: A dance that increases ATTACK.

name: Swift
flavorText: An attack that never misses.

name: Earthquake
flavorText: Tough but useless vs. flying foes.

name: Safeguard
flavorText: Prevents all status problems.

name: Roar
flavorText: Scares wild foes to end battle.

name: Dream Eater
flavorText: Steals HP from a sleeping victim.

name: Recycle
flavorText: Recycles a used item for one more use.

name: Signal Beam
flavorText: A strange beam attack that may confuse the foe.

name: Baton Pass
flavorText: Switches while keeping effects.

name: Nature Power
flavorText: The type of attack varies depending on the location.

name: Smack Down
flavorText: The user throws a stone or projectile to attack an opponent. A flying Pokémon will fall to the ground when hit.

name: Whirlpool
flavorText: Traps the foe for 2-5 turns.

name: Zen Headbutt
flavorText: The user focuses its willpower to its head and rams the foe. It may also make the target flinch.

name: Quick Guard
flavorText: The user protects itself and its allies from priority moves. If used in succession, its chance of failing rises.

name: Eerie Impulse
flavorText: The user’s body generates an eerie impulse. Exposing the target to it harshly lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Overdrive
flavorText: The user attacks opposing Pokémon by twanging a guitar or bass guitar, causing a huge echo and strong vibration.

name: Round
flavorText: The user attacks the target with a song. Others can join in the Round and make the attack do greater damage.

name: Dig
flavorText: 1st turn: Burrow 2nd turn: Attack

name: Double-Edge
flavorText: A tackle that also hurts the user.

name: Brick Break
flavorText: Destroys barriers such as REFLECT and causes damage.

name: Water Pulse
flavorText: Attacks with ultrasonic waves. May confuse the foe

name: Shock Wave
flavorText: A fast and unavoidable electric attack.

name: Focus Blast
flavorText: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.

name: Iron Head
flavorText: The foe slams the target with its steel-hard head. It may also make the target flinch.

name: Healing Wish
flavorText: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its HP restored and status cured.

name: Assist
flavorText: Attacks randomly with one of the partner’s moves.

name: Clear Smog
flavorText: The user attacks by throwing a clump of special mud. All status changes are returned to normal.

name: Secret Power
flavorText: An attack with effects that vary by location.

name: Flash
flavorText: Blinds the foe to reduce accuracy.

name: Captivate
flavorText: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the foe is charmed into sharply lowering its Sp. Atk stat.

name: Grass Knot
flavorText: The user snares the foe with grass and trips it. The heavier the foe, the greater the damage.

name: Psych Up
flavorText: Copies the foe's stat changes.

name: Struggle Bug
flavorText: While resisting, the user attacks the opposing Pokémon. The targets’ Sp. Atk stat is reduced.

name: Overheat
flavorText: Allows a full-power attack, but sharply lowers SP. ATK.

name: Miracle Eye
flavorText: Enables the user to hit a Ghost type with any type of move. It also enables the user to hit an evasive foe.

name: Hex
flavorText: This relentless attack does massive damage to a target affected by status problems.

name: Aqua Ring
flavorText: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP on every turn.

name: Flare Blitz
flavorText: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the foe. The user sustains serious damage, too.

name: Imprison
flavorText: Prevents foes from using moves known by the user.

name: Smelling Salts
flavorText: Powerful against paralyzed foes, but also heals them.

name: Crush Grip
flavorText: The foe is crushed with great force. The attack is more powerful the more HP the foe has left.

name: Breaking Swipe
flavorText: The user swings its tough tail wildly and attacks opposing Pokémon. This also lowers their Attack stats.

name: Rock Tomb
flavorText: Stops the foe from moving with rocks and cuts SPEED.

name: Bulldoze
flavorText: The user stomps down on the ground and attacks everything in the area. Hit Pokémon’s Speed stat is reduced.

name: Snatch
flavorText: Steals the effects of the move the foe uses next.

name: Stealth Rock
flavorText: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the foe. The trap hurts foes that switch into battle.

name: Dive
flavorText: Dives underwater the first turn and strikes next turn.

name: After You
flavorText: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.

name: Ice Ball
flavorText: A 5-turn attack that gains power on successive hits.

name: Teeter Dance
flavorText: Confuses all POKéMON on the scene.

name: Fairy Wind
flavorText: The user stirs up a fairy wind and strikes the target with it.

name: Sticky Web
flavorText: The user weaves a sticky net around the opposing team, which lowers their Speed stat upon switching into battle.

name: Endure
flavorText: Endures any attack for 1 turn, leaving at least 1HP.

name: Astonish
flavorText: An attack that may shock the foe into flinching.

name: Roost
flavorText: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user’s HP by up to half of its max HP.

name: Wish
flavorText: A wish that restores HP. It takes time to work.

name: Fake Tears
flavorText: Feigns crying to sharply lower the foe’s SP. DEF.

name: Avalanche
flavorText: An attack move that inflicts double the damage if the user has been hurt by the foe in the same turn.

name: Draco Meteor
flavorText: Comets are summoned down from the sky. The attack’s recoil sharply reduces the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Grassy Terrain
flavorText: The user turns the ground under everyone’s feet to grass for five turns. This restores the HP of Pokémon on the ground a little every turn.

name: Parting Shot
flavorText: With a parting threat, the user lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats. Then it switches with a party Pokémon.

name: Gravity
flavorText: Gravity is intensified for five turns, making moves involving flying unusable and negating Levitation.

name: Magic Coat
flavorText: Reflects special effects back to the attacker.

name: Poison Jab
flavorText: The foe is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison. It may also poison the foe.

name: Stockpile
flavorText: Charges up power for up to 3 turns.

name: Shadow Claw
flavorText: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Trick Room
flavorText: The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.

name: Assurance
flavorText: If the foe has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack’s power is doubled.

name: Grudge
flavorText: If the user faints, deletes the PP of the final move.

name: Leaf Storm
flavorText: A storm of sharp leaves is whipped up. The attack’s recoil sharply reduces the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Boomburst
flavorText: The user attacks everything around it with the destructive power of a terrible, explosive sound.

name: Psycho Cut
flavorText: The user tears at the foe with blades formed by psychic power. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

name: Guardian of Alola
flavorText: The user, the Land Spirit Pokémon, obtains Alola’s energy using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. This reduces the target’s HP greatly.

name: Mystical Fire
flavorText: The user attacks by breathing a special, hot fire. This also lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Fling
flavorText: The user flings its held item at the foe to attack. Its power and effects depend on the item.

name: Bullet Seed
flavorText: Shoots 2 to 5 seeds in a row to strike the foe.

name: Hyper Voice
flavorText: A loud attack that uses sound waves to injure.

name: Discharge
flavorText: A flare of electricity is loosed to strike all Pokémon in battle. It may also cause paralysis.

name: Attack Order
flavorText: The user calls out its underlings to pummel the foe. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

name: Topsy-Turvy
flavorText: All stat changes affecting the target turn topsy-turvy and become the opposite of what they were.

name: Subzero Slammer
flavorText: The user dramatically drops the temperature using its Z-Power and freezes the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

name: Revelation Dance
flavorText: The user attacks the target by dancing very hard. The user’s type determines the type of this move.

name: Water Pledge
flavorText: A column of water strikes the target. When combined with its fire equivalent, the damage increases and a rainbow appears.

name: Surging Strikes
flavorText: The user attacks the target by poking it with a sharply pointed branch.

name: Freezing Glare
flavorText: The user shoots its psychic power from its eyes to attack. This may also leave the target frozen.

name: Eerie Spell
flavorText: The user attacks with its tremendous psychic power. This also removes 3 PP from the target's last move.

name: Defog
flavorText: Obstacles are moved, reducing the foe’s evasion stat. It can also be used to clear deep fog, etc.

name: Thunder Fang
flavorText: The user bites with electrified fangs. It may also make the foe flinch or become paralyzed.

name: Ice Shard
flavorText: The user flash freezes chunks of ice and hurls them. This move always goes first.

name: Aura Sphere
flavorText: The user looses a blast of aura power from deep within its body. This move is certain to hit.

name: Breakneck Blitz
flavorText: The user builds up its momentum using its Z-Power and crashes into the target at full speed. The power varies, depending on the original move.

name: Phantom Force
flavorText: The user vanishes somewhere, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

name: Blue Flare
flavorText: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense, yet beautiful, blue flame. It may leave the target with a burn.

name: Bullet Punch
flavorText: The user strikes with a tough punch as fast as a bullet. This move always    goes first.

name: Scorching Sands
flavorText: The user throws scorching sand at the target to attack. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Grassy Glide
flavorText: Gliding on the ground, the user attacks the target. This move always goes first on Grassy Terrain.

name: Glacial Lance
flavorText: The user attacks by hurling a blizzard-cloaked icicle lance at opposing Pokémon.

name: Wicked Blow
flavorText: The user, having mastered the Dark style, strikes the target with a fierce blow. This attack always results in a critical hit.

name: Dual Wingbeat
flavorText: The user slams the target with its wings. The target is hit twice in a row.

name: Thunderous Kick
flavorText: The user overwhelms the target with lightning-like movement before delivering a kick. This also lowers the target's Defense stat.

name: Rock Climb
flavorText: A charging attack that may also leave the foe confused. It can also be used to scale rocky walls.

name: Power Whip
flavorText: The user violently whirls its vines or tentacles to harshly lash the foe.

name: Savage Spin-Out
flavorText: The user binds the target with full force with threads of silk that the user spits using its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.

name: Dragon Energy
flavorText: Converting its life-force into power, the user attacks opposing Pokémon. The lower the user's HP, the lower the move's power.

name: Thunder Cage
flavorText: The user traps the target in a cage of sparking electricity for four to five turns.

name: Bug Bite
flavorText: The user bites the foe. If the foe is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

name: Mud Sport
flavorText: Covers the user in mud to raise electrical resistance.

name: Purify
flavorText: The user heals the target’s status condition. If the move succeeds, it also restores the user’s own HP.

name: Malicious Moonsault
flavorText: The user, Incineroar, strengthens its body using its Z-Power and crashes into the target with full force.

name: Mind Blown
flavorText: The user attacks everything around it by causing its own head to explode. This also damages the user.

name: Heart Stamp
flavorText: The user unleashes a vicious blow after its cute act makes the target less wary. It may also make the target flinch.

name: Light of Ruin
flavorText: Drawing power from the Eternal Flower, the user fires a powerful beam of light. This also damages the user quite a lot.

name: Shadow Punch
flavorText: An unavoidable punch that is thrown from shadows.

name: False Surrender
flavorText: The user pretends to bow its head, but then it stabs the target with its disheveled hair. This attack never misses.

name: Life Dew
flavorText: The user scatters mysterious water around and restores the HP of itself and its ally Pokémon in the battle.

name: Spirit Break
flavorText: The user attacks the target with so much force that it could break the target's spirit. This also lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Oceanic Operetta
flavorText: The user, Primarina, summons a massive amount of  water using its Z-Power and attacks the target with  full force.

name: Never-Ending Nightmare
flavorText: Deep-seated grudges summoned by the user’s Z-Power trap the target. The power varies, depending on the original move.

name: Apple Acid
flavorText: The user attacks the target with an acidic liquid created from tart apples. This also lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Bolt Beak
flavorText: The user stabs the target with its electrified beak. If the user attacks before the target, the power of this move is doubled.

name: Searing Sunraze Smash
flavorText: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Solgaleo, attacks the target with full force. This move can ignore the effect of the target’s Ability.

name: Misty Explosion
flavorText: The user attacks everything around it and faints upon using this move. This move's power is increased on Misty Terrain.

name: Fishious Rend
flavorText: The user rends the target with its hard gills. If the user attacks before the target, the power of this move is doubled.

name: Shell Side Arm
flavorText: This move inflicts physical or special damage, whichever will be more effective. This may also poison the target.

name: Splintered Stormshards
flavorText: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Lycanroc, attacks the target with full force. This move negates the effect on the battlefield.

name: Soul-Stealing 7-Star Strike
flavorText: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Marshadow, punches and kicks the target consecutively with full force.

name: Multi-Attack
flavorText: Cloaking itself in high energy, the user slams into the target. The memory held determines the move’s type.

name: Octolock
flavorText: The user locks the target in and prevents it from fleeing. This move also lowers the target's Defense and Sp. Def every turn.

name: Twinkle Tackle
flavorText: The user creates a very charming space using its Z-Power and totally toys with the target. The power varies, depending on the original move.

name: Zing Zap
flavorText: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target, giving it an electric shock. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Terrain Pulse
flavorText: The user utilizes the power of the terrain to attack. This move's type and power changes depending on the terrain when it's used.

name: Rising Voltage
flavorText: The user attacks with electric voltage rising from the ground. This move's power doubles when the target is on Electric Terrain.

name: Strange Steam
flavorText: The user attacks the target by emitting steam. This may also confuse the target.

name: Grav Apple
flavorText: The user inflicts damage by dropping an apple from high above. This also lowers the target's Defense stat.
